Description:
Detection of unusual child processes by different system processes

Author: Semanur Guneysu @semanurtg, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Abused Debug Privilege by Arbitrary Parent Processes
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((parent_process_path like '%\winlogon.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\services.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\lsass.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\csrss.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\smss.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\wininit.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\spoolsv.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\searchindexer.exe') and (username like '%authori%' or username like '%autori%')) and ((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\cmd.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll' or original_file_name = 'cmd.exe'))) and  not (command like '% route %' and command like '% add %'))
